title: Kroger
summary: The Kroger Company, or simply Kroger, is an American retail company founded by Bernard Kroger in 1883 in Cincinnati, Ohio. It is the United States' largest supermarket by revenue ($121.16Â billion for fiscal year 2019),[4] and the second-largest general retailer (behind Walmart).[4] Kroger is the seventh largest American-owned private employer in the United States.[5] Kroger is ranked #23 on the Fortune 500 rankings of the largest United States corporations by total revenue.[6]
